subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mo Williams’s 17 points in the fourth quarter helped the Cleveland Cavaliers rally from an 11-point deficit in the final minutes to beat the host Heat, 107-100, on Monday night.
snippet: Mo Williams’s 17 points in the fourth quarter helped the Cleveland Cavaliers rally from an 11-point deficit in the final minutes to beat the host Heat, 107-100, on Monday night.
